name: Ougi
title: Full Stack Developer and Data Scientist
bio: Passionate about crafting efficient and scalable web applications. Experienced in both frontend and backend development, as well as data analysis and machine learning.

hero.title: Hi, I'm Ougi
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer & Data Scientist
hero.description: I specialize in building efficient and scalable web applications, leveraging my expertise in both frontend and backend development, as well as data analysis and machine learning.

about.summary: I’m a Full Stack Developer and Data Scientist passionate about creating scalable and efficient web applications. I love turning complex problems into elegant solutions and building intuitive user experiences.

highlights.title: Experience
highlights.description: Over 5 years of professional experience building web applications, REST APIs, and data-driven platforms.

highlights.title: Technologies
highlights.description: Proficient in React, TypeScript, Node.js, Python, SQL, and modern machine learning frameworks.

highlights.title: Projects
highlights.description: Worked on multiple full-stack applications, data analysis pipelines, and open-source contributions.

highlights.title: Passion
highlights.description: I enjoy learning new technologies, mentoring junior developers, and optimizing software performance.

about.personalNote: When I’m not coding, I love hiking, photography, and experimenting with AI projects.

cta.title: Let’s work together
cta.description: Have a project idea or need help building something great?

projects.name: Khmer Stop Word Remover
projects.description: A Python package that removes stop words from Khmer text, enhancing natural language processing tasks.

projects.name: Network Scanner
projects.description: A tool to scan and analyze network devices, providing insights into network performance and security.

about.summary: I combine web development and data science to build smart solutions.
about.content: I am a dedicated Full Stack Developer and Data Scientist with a passion for creating efficient and scalable web applications...
about.mission: My mission is to build software that is impactful, maintainable, and user-focused.

educations.details: Specialized in data analysis, machine learning, and big data technologies.
Focused on improving English language skills for academic and professional purposes.
Comprehensive training in frontend and backend web development technologies.
Learning advanced techniques in ethical hacking and cybersecurity.
